name: Of Leaves and Teeth
description:
Two years you spent as a slave of a wicked witch.  A hideous plant monster forced to execute her every whim. Until the magic broke!
As a former slave to the witch, you must navigate the cursed forests of her minions  to find and defeat her in this first-person gameboy dungeon-crawler!


'Of Leaves and Teeth' is a GBJam 10 submission by Traslogan and Jon_Flay, with supporting audio by Falcon's_Downfall. You cannot find the witch, but the core gameplay loop of traversing levels and fighting enemies . For the theme we had it that you are a plant monster created by the evil witch and themed our level around a cursed forest to suit the Plant(s) theme.

Controls are for QWERTY and AZERTY and are noted in-game.
'OfLeavesAndTeeth GBJam10 v1.1.zip' is the official version submitted within the Gamejam. Updates past that are enhances and bugfixes post-jam.
